q1.name: Hammer Shock
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Poppy''' smashes the ground in front of her in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies struck. Against {{tip|monsters}}, the damage based on their {{as|'''maximum''' health}} is capped.
The impacted ground becomes unstable, {{tip|slow|slowing}} enemies within before erupting after 1 second, dealing the same {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies in the area.
leveling:
{{st|Initial Physical Damage|{{ap|40 to 120}} {{as|(+ 90% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 8% of target's '''maximum''' health)}}|Total Physical Damage|{{ap|40*2 to 120*2}} {{as|(+ 180% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 16% of target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}
{{st|Maximum Initial Monster Damage|{{ap|40+50 to 120+170}} {{as|(+ 90% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Maximum Monster Damage|{{ap|(40+50)*2 to (120+170)*2}} {{as|(+ 180% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
q1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} will block only a single instance of damage.
* ''Hammer Shock'' will cast from wherever '''Poppy''' is at the end of the cast time.

e1.name: Heroic Charge
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Poppy''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target enemy's location and, if they are in range upon arrival, she deals them {{as|physical damage}} and {{tip|airborne|carries}} them along with her for up to 300 units.
If the target collides with terrain, she deals them the same {{as|physical damage}} again and {{tip|stun|stuns}} them.
leveling: {{st|Initial Physical Damage|{{ap|60 to 140}} {{as|(+ 50% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Physical Damage|{{ap|60*2 to 140*2}} {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
e1.notes:
* '''Poppy''' will be ordered to basic attack the target.
* ''Heroic Charge'' applies [[Ability effects|spell effects]] twice (once when '''Poppy''' hits her target and once she stuns them against a wall).
* ''Heroic Charge'' interacts with impassable player-created terrain ({{ai|Crystallize|Anivia}}, {{ai|Emperor's Divide|Azir}}, {{ai|Cataclysm|Jarvan IV}}, {{ai|Pillar of Ice|Trundle}}).
* The {{tip|dash}} does not follow targets. The target's position at the time of ''Heroic Charge's'' cast is the direction '''Poppy''' will dash towards.
** '''Poppy''' does not {{tip|airborne|carry}} nor deal damage to the target if they are not in range before she collides with them.

r1.name: Keeper's Verdict
r1.target_range: {{tt|500 - 1700 (based on channel time)|Range grows after 0.5 seconds and over 0.5 seconds}}
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Poppy''' {{tip|channels|charges}} for up to 4 seconds, {{tip|slow|slowing}} herself by 15% and increasing ''Keeper's Verdict's'' range and {{tip|airborne|knock back}} distance over the duration. ''Keeper's Verdict'' can be recast at any time within its duration.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Poppy''' smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that travels in the target direction until it collides with an enemy {{tip|champion}}, causing a hammer to erupt in the process. Enemies within the shockwave's path or struck by the hammer's eruption are dealt {{as|physical damage}} and {{tip|airborne|knocked back}} a massive distance towards the enemy team's [[Spawn|fountain]].

Releasing the ability within {{tt|{{fd|0.5}} seconds}} of the activation ends the charge to instead launch the hammer upwards, dealing 50% damage and {{tip|airborne|knocking up}} all enemies around '''Poppy''' for {{fd|0.75}} seconds.

If '''Poppy''' is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}} during the charge, or the charge completes without reactivation, ''Keeper's Verdict'' is canceled and the ability is put on a 30-second {{sti|cooldown}}.
Enemies knocked {{tip|airborne}} are {{tip|sight|revealed}} and are rendered {{tip|untargetable}} while being displaced if '''Poppy''' charged ''Keeper's Verdict'' for more than {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
r1.notes:
* Enemies within the enemy team's fountain (at least 400 units away from the {{tt|center of the fountain|the respawning point}}) that are hit by a ''Keeper's Verdict'' that would knock them back are instead {{tip|airborne|knocked up}} for {{fd|0.75}} seconds. They are not rendered {{tip|untargetable}}.
* ''Keeper's Verdict'' does not destroy in-flight {{tip|projectile|projectiles}} for enemies hit if they are rendered {{tip|untargetable}}.
* The {{tip|airborne|knock back}} will only displace enemies as far as they can go (e.g. to the furthest current spot available of {{ais|Realm of Death|Mordekaiser}} and {{ais|The Hextech Ultimatum|Camille}} borders and to the corner of the fountain).
** The displacement's duration will remain unchanged regardless of if the knock back cannot achieve its full distance due to the affected target being restricted by boundaries they are unable to cross. In order for this to be possible, the speed of the knock back is decreased (based on where the actual landing point is) to match the amount of distance covered to time spent displaced.
* ''Keeper's Verdict's'' {{tip|airborne}} effect cannot be removed by {{tip|cleanse|cleansing}} effects.
